mapper.insert: insert into feed_post (id, user_id, "text", photo_url, created_at) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{text,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, user_id, "text", photo_url, created_at from feed_post
